description: Reports of the president’s comments prompted outcry from some lawmakers, but they were followed by notable silence from others.
title: How Republican Lawmakers Responded to Trump’s Vulgar Immigration Remarks
title_page: How Republican Lawmakers Responded to Trump’s Vulgar Immigration Remarks - The New York Times
maintext:
Senator Lamar Alexander Tenn.
“We should respect every country, and for countries such as those in Africa where they have been less fortunate because of poverty or disease — some of the proudest moments of the United States have been when we have taken our wealth and our expertise and helped them.”
